Raider's War Cry.name: Raider's War Cry
Raider's War Cry.flavor: You lunge at your foe with a bloodthirsty yell and a vicious attack, slamming your enemy to the ground.
Raider's War Cry.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Cheap Shot.name: Cheap Shot
Cheap Shot.flavor: You strike your foe in a vulnerable area to cause crippling pain.
Cheap Shot.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage. If the target is granting combat advantage to you, it is weakened and dazed (save ends both).
Cheap Shot.onMiss: Half damage. If the target is granting combat advantage to you, it is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Dread Quarry.name: Dread Quarry
Dread Quarry.flavor: You spy a new enemy and swear an oath to bring it down.
Dread Quarry.target: The nearest enemy to you that you can see
Dread Quarry.effect: Using your Hunter’s Quarry, you designate the target as your quarry. Until the target is no longer your quarry, your Hunter’s Quarry deals one extra die of Hunter’s Quarry damage to the target.
